content: it s no secret that hanna lisa adores knitting - and wearing - socks the not-so-vanilla vanilla socks are the perfect canvas for showing off that gorgeous hand-dyed skein of yarn you ve had in your stash forever or for your first foray into all-natural sock yarns free on the website 1 direct pd f download the pattern is graded to 5 sizes and comes with measuring instructions and a little calculation exercise to ensure the perfect snug fit on your own foot they re knit toe-up with a fleegle s heel - hanna lisa s absolute favorite heel to fit a medium-to-high instep **sizes** 1 2 3 4 5 finished foot circumference 17 18 19 20 25 21 25 cm / 6 75 7 7 5 8 8 5 - recommended to be worn with 15% negative ease at the ball of your foot foot length is customizable i recommend a foot length with about 10% of negative ease leg length is customizable **yarn** woollentwine corriedale sock 100% corriedale 400 meters / 437 yards per 100 g / 3 5 oz 1 skein or 400 meters / 437 yards of fingering weight yarn sample shown is knit in colourway winter blossom **needles** 2 mm / us 0 circular needle with a cable length of at least 80 cm / 32 or needle size to obtain gauge this pattern uses the magic loop technique you can of course also work it on mini circulars or dpns **gauge** 34 sts x 48 rounds = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 in the round in stockinette stitch after blocking **notions** darning needle 1 stitch marker tape measure **skills** increasing decreasing **finished measurements** foot circumference 17 18 19 20 25 21 25 cm / 6 75 7 7 5 8 8 5 leg length customizable 1 https //cdn shopify com/s/files/1/0591/5983/8893/files/not-so-vanilla_vanilla_socks-making_stories-30nov2022-v1 pdf v=1670415957
